name: rackspace deprovision
description: Deprovision servers in Rackspace. Deprovisions all servers started in a previous provision tasks.

version.description: API version to use: v1 or v2 for Open Cloud Servers

endpoint.description: endpoint used for Rackspace v2, choosing the region to use

auth_url.description: authentication endpoint, default to https://auth.api.rackspacecloud.com for US accounts, https://lon.auth.api.rackspacecloud.com for UK ones

dns_names.description: list of dns image names to deprovision
